description: Retrieves the current data access role for the given resource registered in Lake Formation.

nested_items.name: ResourceInfo
nested_items.description: A structure containing information about an Lake Formation resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role that registered a resource.

nested_items.name: LastModified
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: WithFederation
nested_items.description: Whether or not the resource is a federated resource.

nested_items.name: HybridAccessEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the data access of tables pointing to the location can be managed by both Lake Formation permissions as well as Amazon S3 bucket policies.

nested_items.name: WithPrivilegedAccess
nested_items.description: Grants the calling principal the permissions to perform all supported Lake Formation operations on the registered data location.
